In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對企業電子化應用整合作探討，其中包含：1.企業電子化介紹2.企業化經營管理模式3.企業電子化的推展方法討論4.企業再造5.辦公室自動化6.企業資源管理7.中小企業電子化模式8.電子化服務與管理9.企業電子化效率評估10.個案研究
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the E-Business Application Integration. The contents if this course will include: 1.Introduction of e-business 2.The e-business management model 3.The Developments of e-Business 4.Business re-engineering 5.Office Automation 6.Enterprise Resource Planning 7.Middle & Small Enterprise e-business management model 8.Business e-Service & Management 9.Efficiency analysis of e-business 10.Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程為講授鋼鐵製造原理與技術。內容分兩單元，一為生鐵之製煉，另一為鋼之製煉。生鐵之製煉講述鐵礦石之還原反應及高爐操作之熱力學原理及其應用，以及高爐操作之技術發展。並介紹直接製鐵及溶融還原法之概要。鋼之製煉講述煉鋼之治金熱力學原理，並說明頂吹式純氧氣轉爐，底吹式純氧氣轉爐，頂底吹轉爐，電爐及平爐煉鋼法之冶煉技術。
description.en: The course is to lecture the principle and technique of making ferrous products, itscontent is divided into two parts, one is the refining of pig iron, the other is therefining of steel. The former one is to describe the reduction reaction of ferrousmine, and the thermal dynamics principle and application of a blast furnace, thetechnique development of a blast furnace operation as well. The latter one is todescribe the metallurgical thermal dynamics principle of steel making, and to describe the smelting techniquesof the converter with pure oxgen infusing from upper part or bottom, electric furnace, open hearth.

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 從人類、社會、人文學上探討人性、設計倫理與資源、經濟之關係，建立設計之推行及正確理念。
description.en: Lecture on the development of prime influences on design domestically and internationally, with emphasis on the work of key industrial designers. Discussion sessions with reading assignments will be carried out through the course, and submission of a written report is required.

description.zh: 這門課將教導學生溝通設計概念的原理及將設計資訊視覺化的方法，在視覺設計的架構下將介紹人們尋求資訊的行為、尋求資訊的工作、及理解方法的模型，衡量使用者資訊需求和評估設計有效性的方法將作為設計實習的基本工具，學生將學會使用文字、圖形、音樂、及時間面向來有效溝通的技巧，以用於相關的土木工程領域。
description.en: This course will introduce students to investigate the theory of transactional process of creating meaning in communication and to visualize design information. Models of people's information seeking behavior, information seeking tasks, and how people read will be introduced as the theoretical framework for visual design. Methodologies for assessing readers' information needs and evaluating the effectiveness of designs will be introduced as the basic tools of design practice. Students will be familiar with graphical representation skills using words, images, sound, and time to communicate efficiently and apply the skills to the disciplines of civil engineering.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 上課時間星期三第二、三、四節

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting. All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis. After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。

After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。

This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: CMMI(軟體能力成熟度)是一種用於評鑑軟體承包商的能力，並幫助改善軟體質量的方法，CMMI對軟體工程程序進行管理和改進，增強開發與改進能力，從而能開發出高質量的軟體。本課程內容將涵蓋：(1)CMMI概念；(2)成熟度2(ML2)之流程領域(除SAM)，含需求管理(REQM)、專案規劃(PP)、專案監控(PMC)、度量與分析(MA)、流程與產品品質保證(PPQA)與建構管理(CM)；(3)成熟度2與3(ML2/3)之工程相關流程領域，含需求發展(RD)、技術解決方案(TS)、產品整合(PI)、驗證(VER)與確認(VAL)；(4)SCAMPI評鑑簡介；(5)個案研究。
description.en: Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI) is a framework that can be adopted by software developing organizations to improve their software development process and product quality. CMMI is also applicable for assessing a contractor's capability. This course will cover the fundamentals of CMMI including:(1) Introductory concepts of CMMI;(2) Process areas in maturity level 2 (excluding SAM), including Requirements Management (REQM), Project Planning (PP), Project Monitoring and Control (PMC), Measurement and Analysis (MA), Process and Product Quality Assurance (PPQA) and Configuration Management (CM);(3) Engineering Process areas in maturity level 3, including Requirements Development (RD), Technical Solution (TS), Product Integration (PI), Verification (VER) and Validation (VAL);(4) Introduction to appraisals with SCAMPI; and(5) Case studies.

notes: 最後一哩課程，上課教室調整至綜科208

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。
description.en: The nature of business research、scientific method、conceptual foundations of research、theory and research、elements of research and research process、research problem and hypothesis、literature review and variable of research、constructing operational definitions、measurement、modeling theoretical structures、research design、 research proposal、survey research、questionnaires、interview technique、documentary historical method and observation、case study、scaling、experiment、data analysis、univariate analysis and general statistical analysis、multivariate analysis、the interpretation of data、research report、policy implication of business research

description.zh: 講授設計研究領域中之理論與實務，包括美學、人機介面、社會文化、科技發展、及環境等議題。本課程之目標在於呈現各種設計研究的特質與限制，進而引導研究生以分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考架構理論，做為設計研究之基礎。
description.en: Lecture on theories and practice of contemporary design research including fields of aesthetics, ergonomics, sociology, development of science and technology, and environmental issue. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research potential and conduct individuals through rigor process of strategic literature research, in which, method of analysis, criticism, reconstruction and generalization will be employed.

description.zh: 為拓展台灣憲政發展的時期深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，並建構多元化台灣社會的民主法治觀念，本課程擬從憲法的基本架構出發，以廣義憲法的角度，從事下述內容的研析： 首先，就憲法的涵義、特質、種類及其變遷、成長與趨勢等加以討論；其次就憲法的法典內容提供學理與法理的知識探索；再次，針對增修條文的理論與實際，分析現階段憲政運作的實務經驗；最後，指出憲政發展與政治穩定的思考方向以作結。
description.en: To study the time length of the constitutional development of Taiwan and strengthen the relation between tradition and modern period. Also to establish a democratic concept in the multilateral society. This class will study the base of our Constitution, the explore the following items: To give a historical point of view of the meaning, character and progress of our Constitution. Then from the academic point of view to analyze the connotation of the Constitution. To attend the foundation of revised version, and give an analytical of the practice side of the operation of Constitution. Finally, to point out the correlation between the development of constitution and steadiness of politics.

description.zh: 「他山之石可以攻錯」，「比較憲法」課程將以法制的、生態的、動態的觀點，探討英、美、法、德、日、蘇以及東南亞國家的憲政，與我國究竟有何不同？藉以增強同學對我國憲政發展的瞭解。
description.en: "Another's good quality, whereby one can remedy one's own defects".  Based on a legal and dynamic viewpoint, "Comparative Constitution" is to discuss the difference between our constitution and those of England, America, France, Germany, Japan, Russia and South Asian nations? The purpose of the course is to build up student's understanding of constitutional development in our country.

description.zh: 民主政治為法治政治，凡政府各項施政均需有法令依據。行政法，乃是國家各行政機關所適用之各種法令規章之總稱，其內容含蓋國家行政機關之組織、職權、作用、程序及爭訟等事項之法規，範圍至為廣泛，且與人民之權利、義務息息相關。本課程將以系統化、生動化，並輔以實例之方式講授，以啟發同學學習興趣。同學修習本課程，除可增進法治知能與素養外，並可對日常生活之權益維護有重大裨益。
description.en: Democracy is regarded as rule by law nowadays. All official policies that are implemented by government must be based on law. Administrative law is a general term of all kinds of regulations and laws that are suitable for administrative organizations. The content includes of administrative organization in this country. The course serves as extensive rules that are related to people is rights and obligations. The principle emphasis of the course is on the systematic instruction with specific examples tc enlighten students learning interest, furthermore not only promoting knowledge and professional training in law but also effective in daily life.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
description.en: This course is designated to enhance students' English ability so that they can perform well in any future programme of study. The course consists of two main elements: 1. EFL listening, speaking, reading, and writing, 2. self study skills.

name.zh: 行動網際網路技術與應用

description.zh: 本課程的目的在協助學生了解新興及行動通訊產業的技術基礎及未來應用發展。希望藉由課程討論激發與課人員探討無線科技能產生的新應用並進一步以小組專案方式擬出行動應用可行的商業方案。主要課題包括：1.無線通訊系統演進簡介2.無線/公眾區域網路技術與應用3.行動通訊系統技GSM/GPRS/3G 4.行動加值服務應用與規劃5.加值服務商業模式探討6.行動商務及行動付款服務規劃7.行動定位服務探討8.第三代行動通訊概況
description.en: This course focused at the Mobile Internet both Technology and Application related topics. It is designed to bridge the GAP between Internet and Mobile communication (both Wireless LAN & Cellular communication) using system architecture and value-added services examples. The discussion topics will include: 1.Overview of Wireless Communication Systems 2.[Public]Wireless LAN Technology/System Architecture & Applications 3.Introduction of Cellular communication: GSM/GPRS/3G 4.Mobile Value-Added Service (M-VAS) Planning 5.M-VAS Business Model discussion 6.Mobile Commerce & Mobile Payment 7.Mobile Positioning System & Location-Base Service 8. 3G Service NOW

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

name.zh: 高分子表面處理與加工
name.en: Polymers applied to surface treatment and processing

description.zh: 講授基本的高分子反應原理及應用範圍，並針對高分子在表面加工方面的相關理論知識，並進行小型實驗驗證所學知識，同時安排公司參訪及業界人士講授業界經驗及需求，使學生了解高分子在實務上的真正應用、及在表面加工領域的實用性與未來性。內容包括1.	高分子材料概論2.	高分子的應用範圍3.	高分子表面處理之應用4.	高分子表面處理之技術5.	表面特性的檢測6.	高分子表面處理的簡易實驗7.	高分子在表面加工的實務應用與經驗演講8.	公司參訪-高分子表面處理
description.en: The synthesis and applications of polymer will be introduced as well as the knowledge of polymeric surface treatment technology. Experiments, speeches and factor tours relative to polymeric surface treatment will arranged for further understanding. The contents are as follow:1.	Introduction of Polymer Materials2.	Applications of Polymers3.	Application on surface treatment4.	Technologies of polymer surface treatments5.	Surface Characterization6.	Experiments7.	Speeches8.	Factor tours

name.zh: 半導體及光電產業使用之表面處理
name.en: Theoretical and practical guides to surface treatments for s

description.zh: 本課程目標在教授學生光電半導體及光電、能源相關產業之製程技術以及其表面處理技術之實務知識。藉由介紹光電半導體材料及光電、能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況，並由基本的光電半導體及電化學原理為出發點，教導學生了解光電半導體材料及光電、能源材料的基本特性及相關製作和表面處理程序。透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解光電半導體材料之基本特性、應用領域、及實務製造之知識與產業。課程設計將著重基礎光電半導體及光電、能源材料知識的建立、實務之應用與工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教 將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力及實際製造程序的相關知識 。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to provide the professional training in manufacturing techniques and surface treatment skills for semiconductor, display, and optical industries. The fundamental theories in solid state physics and electrochemistry will be introduced to help students realize the working principles as well as operating mechanisms of electro-optical devices. In the second section, theories of various surface treatment methods are introduced and comparisons between these methods are analyzed through material characterization techniques. Finally, practical industrial problems will be discussed by case studies and the exchange of plant tour experiences will enhance the comprehensive understanding for all students, which will shorten the gap between academic theoretical learning and real industrial needs.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy.
